Load the library.

```{r}
library(wiod)
```

Load the data.

```{r}
data("wiod95")
```

Load the `decompr` package.

```{r}
library(decompr)
```

Apply the `leontief` decomposition and save the output to an object `l1995`.

```{r}
l1995 <- decomp(inter95,
                final95,
                countries,
                industries,
                output95,
                method = "leontief" )
```
